name: Michie
message: Merry Christmas sa lahat! Hope oks lang kayo and sana magkita kits na tayo ulit next year in person!

name: Azel
message: Maligayang Pasko! Keep safe, kita kits pag okay na! Miss you all! :)

name: Jeykle
message: Wishing everyone peace, health, happiness, and prosperity in the coming year. Merry Christmas!
